code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule(
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic cin,
    output logic cout,
    output logic sum
);

always @(*) begin
    sum = a ^ b ^ cin;
    cout = (a & b) | (b & cin) | (a & cin);
end

endmodule
[DONE]
